Posts.EditableText: Is there a way to decrease the resolution or other way zoom in wthin the PC clint settings?
Posts.HTML: Is there a way to decrease the resolution or other way zoom in wthin the PC clint settings?

Posts.EditableText: The client is an embedded chromium, I believe, so some of the default keyboard shortcuts might work. Could be worth trying [Ctrl]+[+]. Don't know if there's anything in the actual program settings.
Posts.HTML: The client is an embedded chromium, I believe, so some of the default keyboard shortcuts might work. Could be worth trying [Ctrl]+[+]. Don't know if there's anything in the actual program settings.
